doc.after: Falun Gong (simplified Chinese: æ³è½®å; traditional Chinese: æ³è¼ªå; pinyin: FÇlÃºn GÅng; literally "Practice of the Wheel of Law"), also known as Falun Dafa (simplified Chinese: æ³è½®å¤§æ³; traditional Chinese: æ³è¼ªå¤§æ³; pinyin: FÇlÃºn dÃ fÇ; lit. "Great Law of the Wheel of Law"), is a system of mind and body cultivation introduced by Li Hongzhi (surname is Li) to the public in 1992. Falun Gong refers to five sets of meditation exercises (four standing, and one sitting meditation) and spiritual teachings. According to Li, when one cultivates his or her xinxing (mind nature or character), he/she can assimilate to the supreme nature of the universeâTruthfulness, Compassion, Forbearance. In recent years, added emphasis has been placed on the concept of Fa-Rectification.
